## Project Title 1: Consumer Insights Dashboard Design
In this project, I created an interactive dashboard using Google Data Studio to analyze customer behavior data for an e-commerce brand. The goal was to uncover actionable insights on purchasing patterns, churn risk, and customer lifetime value.

**Skills Demonstrated:**

- Data Analysis: Cleaned and interpreted data from Google Analytics and Shopify reports.

- Dashboard Development: Designed a user-friendly, real-time dashboard for marketing stakeholders.

- Customer Segmentation: Identified high-value segments based on behavior and engagement metrics.

- Insight Communication: Presented findings to non-technical stakeholders in a visual, compelling format.

## Project Title 2: A/B Testing for Landing Page Optimization
This project focused on improving conversion rates for a mock product landing page. I designed and ran an A/B test using simulated traffic data to evaluate the impact of different headline copy and CTA buttons.

**Skills Demonstrated:**

- Experiment Design: Created hypotheses, testing criteria, and success metrics.

- Statistical Analysis: Used Excel and basic Python to interpret test results and determine significance.

- User Behavior Insight: Analyzed heatmaps and bounce rates to inform design choices.

- Optimization Strategy: Recommended data-backed changes that improved conversion rate by 12%.
